name: La Belle et La Dent
description:
entry for the bitsy tooth jam! WARNING: descriptions of skulls/blood/things turning into bones. you know how it is.

this took a wild turn like 3 days in, by which i mean i scrapped my half-finished game to make a beauty and the beast story with teeth in it. don't ask!
all hacks taken from here, special thanks to @mildmojo for the exit from dialogue hack which is basically the only thing holding this game together.

(also here's my inspo playlist for this experience if you were wondering)
